We propose prospective , randomize , double blind , placebo control trial 120 subject recruit WRNMMC Urogynecology Clinic study post-operative efficacy Exparel® pain control patient undergo Urogynecology surgery involve posterior vaginal wall . Subjects randomize receive either 20mL extended-release bupivacaine 20mL placebo . The primary objective trial evaluate cumulative post-operative vaginal pain use front side Defense Veterans Pain Rating Scale16 day 1 3 post-procedure..
